title: weapon auto selection
content:
Options -> Player Setup -> set "Switch on Pickup" to "Off"

neverswitchonpickup "True"
Default: 0

All you need to do is type that in your console, or edit the INI file of zdoom and located that option. Your Choice, its not in the menus.


Weapon.SelectionOrder value
Defines the place in the weapons list when ammo runs out. Lower numbers have higher priority.


WEAPON.NO_AUTO_SWITCH
When the player picks this weapon up, they will never automatically switch to it. 

WEAPON.AMMO_OPTIONAL is the contrary: it tells the engine not to switch from that weapon.
